Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.project.compiler

[Groovy] Class GrailsProjectCompiler

      • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.project.compiler.GrailsProjectCompiler

      • Encapsulates the compilation logic required for a Grails application.

        Authors:
        Graeme Rocher
        Since:
        2.0
